column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////Quite possibly the best deep dish pizza I've eaten.  While it was deep dish
column2: the crust was not whole and solid.  It was perfect.  The tomato sauce with chunks of tomato that you can taste.  We asked what would be a good portion
column3: here I am thinking that a medium would be good for 2 people
column4: but we managed to get full on 1 small and an appetizer.  As recommender by our waiter.
